Question (English): What does the Remote Work (VPN) Security Pledge include?
Question (Vietnamese): Bản Cam kết Bảo mật trong quá trình làm việc từ xa (VPN) bao gồm nội dung nào?
Answer:
Employees commit to providing accurate information for the process in remote access.
• Employees commit to ensuring the confidentiality of the information provided for the process of remote working 
(accounts, password, log-in process..) and not to disclosing to unrelated people.
• Employees commit to ensuring minimum requirements for remote working, remote access in order to ensure information 
security on devices: 
- Protect devices and access from malware. Install Anti Virus and enable Firewall for all operating systems (Windows, 
MAC, Ubuntu);
- Don't disable, remove or change VPN settings, security software such as encryption software, antivirus software, 
firewall,...;
- Comply with regulations on software installation and usage;
- Comply with regulations on data storage and backup data on the system;                                                                                                      
- Comply with Company Security Information procedures , also be responsible for implementing requirements when 
requested;
- Limit remote access in the public places or not being secure in terms of network security: cafe shop, internet shop...
Source: CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION COMMITMENT IN REMOTE ACCESS (VPN)

Question (English): What should employees do if they see signs of computer instability?
Question (Vietnamese): Trong trường hợp thấy có dấu hiệu máy tính bất ổn nhân viên phải làm gì?
Answer: In case you have report that the device shows signs of instability (virus infection....), disconnect from the network and notify IFU staff immediately
Source: CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION COMMITMENT IN REMOTE ACCESS (VPN)

Question (English): Is remote access possible in public places?
Question (Vietnamese): Có thể truy cập từ xa ở nơi công cộng không?
Answer: Remote access is possible in public places, but this is restricted.
Source: CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION COMMITMENT IN REMOTE ACCESS (VPN)

Question (English): Part-time employee A uses a personal computer for work and has been approved by his superiors and completed the procedures to allow connection to the internal network. So, does employee A need to install Antivirus software?
Question (Vietnamese): Nhân viên part-time A sử dụng máy tính cá nhân để làm việc và đã được cấp trên phê duyệt cũng như hoàn thành các thủ tục cho phép kết nối mạng nội bộ. Như vậy, bạn A có cần cài đặt phần mềm Antivirus hay không?
Answer: Once the procedures have been completed and approved by superiors, it means that part-time employee A has committed to complying with the regulations within the procedures. In particular, installing Antivirus software is mandatory.
Source: COMMITMENT TO CONFIDENTIALITY IN THE PROCESS OF USING PERSONAL DEVICES FOR WORK

Question (English): Due to work factors, I am required to use high-risk software. Am I allowed to install high-risk software? If yes, what steps do I need to take?
Question (Vietnamese): Do yếu tố công việc mà tôi bắt buộc phải sử dụng đến phần mềm rủi do cao. Vậy tôi có được phép cài đặt các phần mềm rủi do cao không? Nếu có thì cần làm gì?

Question (English): I noticed that my computer was slow and kept freezing. So, I decided to reinstall my computer's operating system. Is this action in accordance with company policy?

Source: COMMITMENT FOR THE PROCESS OF INSTALLING, ACTING THE HIGH RISK SOFTWARES/ UNPERMITTED BEHAVIOURS IN THE COMPANY

Question (English): What regulations must be followed when installing high-risk software?
Question (Vietnamese): Phải tuân thủ những quy định nào khi cài đặt phần mềm có rủi ro cao?
Answer:
I hereby commits to the content below:
• Commit to taking full responsibilities for ensuring the term that indicated in the Information Security
commitment signed on the first day of working in company;
• Commit searching and understanding the risk and the impact of installing & using the software requested in this 
commitment;
• Commit to ensuring the safety of confidential information in the request devices; not to sharing any important 
information on the Internet .
• Commit to obeying the Company's Information Security Regulations: 
Reference the following:
- Employees using Windows OS, MAC OS, Ubuntu OS have to install Anti Virus and enable Firewall;
-
When using Company's computer/laptop or Personal devices which are permitted to connect local network,

- Be careful on clicking unsecured links 
(In case, the devices have the abnormal signal, employee must immediately disconnect and notify ITA's staff)

Question (English): Customer A comes to work at Sun-asterisk, and he has a friend who is an employee at Sun-asterisk Vietnam. They sit and chat, and Customer A discusses the project details, contract, and other related information about Sun-asterisk. What is Customer A violating by doing this? And what responsibilities do they need to bear?
Question (Vietnamese): Khách hàng A tới Sun-asterisk làm việc, anh ta có một người bạn là nhân viên của công ty Sun-asterisk Việt nam. Hai người ngồi trò chuyện với nhau và khách hàng A có kể về nội dung dự án, hợp đồng và một số thông tin khác liên quan tới công ty Sun-asterisk. Việc làm này của khách hàng A đang vi phạm điều gì? Và họ cần phải chịu những trách nghiệm như thế nào?
Answer: When customers come to Sun-asterisk to work. It is necessary to commit to keep confidential information of Sun Asterisk Vietnam Co., Ltd. confidential, not to disclose or allow any other individual or organization to obtain it directly or indirectly, unless there is written consent from Sun Asterisk Vietnam Co., Ltd. Therefore, in this case, Customer A has violated: CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION COMMITMENT FOR CUSTOMERS WORKING IN SUN ASTERISK VIETNAM. In case of violation, the customer will have to compensate for all damages to Sun Asterisk Vietnam Co., Ltd., including but not limited to material losses, reputation, image, costs to remedy damages, litigation costs, and lawyers.
Source: CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION COMMITMENT  FOR CUSTOMERS WORKING IN SUN ASTERISK VIET NAM
